name: Shity Knights
description:
A fun fun 2D action game.

How to play:

1. use ARROW KEYS to move

2. press SPACE to jump

3. Z for big attack X for smol attack

4. press Left SHIFT to use your shield. You should be looking at your enemy to guard properly

5. press any attack keys (Z, X) in the air to do 

S U P E R  A I R  A T T A C K
